Header.title: Samuel Hali'a Nelson
Header.paragraph: Welcome! Have a look around to learn more about me, and see some of the cool things I've made!

About.intro: First off, I'm glad you're here! Thank you for stopping by! Feel free to use the contact form below to reach out, I'm always looking to connect and learn from others! Now, let me tell you a bit about me!
About.paragraph: I am a first-generation college graduate, of mixed ancestry including AAPI and Native Hawaiian descent. Whether it's making my own desk, assembling my self-fabricated metal parts to build something else, or building things with code - I’m a tinkerer and self-starter who loves making things. I love reading, and am currently brushing up on Data Structures and Algorithms. I am pursuing a career in tech to follow a longstanding passion for creativity and technology, and generally to just make great things.

text: ● Mood Music: Mobile App For Music Categorization
